comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Florence Walton (1890 in Wilmington, Delaware - January 7, 1981 in New York City) was an American dancer and actress www.imdb.com/name/nm0910503 Maurice Mouvet (1889 -1927), American dancer, was her first husband. "Mouvet and Walton married in 1911 and became one of the most successful teams of the day until they divorced in 1920." www.streetswing.com/histmai2/d2movet1.htm Another photo with Maurice Mouvet: see comments there

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: In 1914, they opened a ballroom and restaurant (NYT October 16, 1914 ) and Maurice invented a new dance, the "Pericon" (Omaha daily bee., October 28, 1914, Page 9, with photos)

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: Thanks B-59 for the full names of these dancers. We will update our catalog record.
